trans-unit.source: Provides the base implementation for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref> interface and enables object sharing between applications.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce l'implementazione di base per il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref> oggetto di interfaccia e consente la condivisione tra le applicazioni.

trans-unit.source: Component is the base class for all components in the common language runtime that marshal by reference.
trans-unit.target: Componente è la classe base per tutti i componenti di common language runtime che il marshalling per riferimento.

trans-unit.source: Component is remotable and derives from the <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject> class.
trans-unit.target: Componente utilizzabile in remoto e deriva dalla <xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>classe.</xref:System.MarshalByRefObject>

trans-unit.source: Component provides an implementation of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> interface.
trans-unit.target: Componente fornisce un'implementazione del <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>interfaccia.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent> provides an implementation of <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> that marshals by value.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>fornisce un'implementazione di <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>che esegue il marshalling per valore.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> </xref:System.ComponentModel.MarshalByValueComponent>

trans-unit.source: You can host a Component in any object that implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> interface, and you can query and get services from its container.
trans-unit.target: È possibile ospitare un componente in qualsiasi oggetto che implementa il <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>interfaccia ed è possibile eseguire una query e ottenere servizi dal contenitore.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: The container creates an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> for each Component it contains.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore viene creato un <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>per ogni componente che contiene.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: The container uses the site to manage the Component and is used by the Component to communicate with its container.
trans-unit.target: Il contenitore utilizza il sito per gestire il componente e viene utilizzato dal componente per comunicare con il relativo contenitore.

trans-unit.source: A Component should release resources explicitly by calls to its <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method, without waiting for automatic memory management through an implicit call to the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Un componente deve rilasciare le risorse in modo esplicito mediante chiamate al relativo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>metodo, senza attendere la gestione automatica della memoria tramite una chiamata implicita al <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> is disposed, all components within the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> are also disposed.
trans-unit.target: Quando un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>viene eliminato, tutti i componenti all'interno di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>vengono anche eliminati.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Container> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Container>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the component can raise an event.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il componente può generare un evento.

trans-unit.source: The default implementation of this property always returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: L'implementazione predefinita di questa proprietà restituisce sempre `true`.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> class should override this property to provide the ability to disable the raising of events.
trans-unit.target: Le classi che ereditano dalla <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>classe deve eseguire l'override di questa proprietà per fornire la possibilità di disabilitare la generazione di eventi.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: For example, in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> class, if the control is being hosted as an ActiveX control, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A> property returns `false` if the ActiveX control has its events frozen.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>classe, se è ospitato il controllo come controllo ActiveX di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A>restituisce proprietà `false` se il controllo ActiveX gli eventi è bloccati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CanRaiseEvents%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the component can raise events; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il componente può generare eventi; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> che contiene il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The components in a container are tracked in a first-in, first-out list, which also defines the order of the components within the container.
trans-unit.target: I componenti in un contenitore vengono tenuta traccia in un first-in First-Out elenco, che definisce anche l'ordine dei componenti all'interno del contenitore.

trans-unit.source: The last component added is the last component in the list.
trans-unit.target: L'ultimo componente aggiunto è l'ultimo componente nell'elenco.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref> that contains the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is not encapsulated in an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref> che contiene il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se presente, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> non è incapsulato in un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is currently in design mode.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> è attualmente in modalità progettazione.

trans-unit.source: The design mode indicator is stored in the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; therefore, if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> does not have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associated with it, the value of this property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Indicatore della modalità di progettazione viene archiviato nel <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>; pertanto, se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>non esiste un <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>associato, il valore di questa proprietà è `false`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is in design mode; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> è in modalità progettazione; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia tutte le risorse usate dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Call Dispose when you are finished using the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare Dispose dopo aver terminato di utilizzare <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The Dispose method leaves the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> in an unusable state.
trans-unit.target: Il metodo Dispose lascia il <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>in uno stato inutilizzabile.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: After calling Dispose, you must release all references to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> was occupying.
trans-unit.target: Dopo aver chiamato Dispose, è necessario rilasciare tutti i riferimenti al <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>in modo che il garbage collector può recuperare la memoria che di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>occupata.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [implementazione di un metodo Dispose](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Always call Dispose before you release your last reference to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Chiamare sempre Dispose prima di rilasciare l'ultimo riferimento a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> object's `Finalize` method.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, le risorse non vengono liberate finché il garbage collector chiama la <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>dell'oggetto `Finalize` metodo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia le risorse non gestite usate dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> e facoltativamente rilascia le risorse gestite.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A> method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo viene chiamato dal metodo pubblico <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>metodo e <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`richiama il metodo protetto `Dispose(Boolean)` metodo con il `disposing` parametro impostato su `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>richiama `Dispose` con `disposing` impostato su `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando il `disposing` parametro `true`, questo metodo rilascia tutte le risorse utilizzate dagli oggetti gestiti da questo <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>riferimenti.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo richiama il `Dispose()` metodo di ciascun oggetto cui viene fatto riferimento.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>per rilasciare le risorse gestite e non gestite. <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> per rilasciare solo le risorse non gestite.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the component is disposed by a call to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*> method.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il componente viene eliminato da una chiamata al <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*>metodo.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose*>

trans-unit.source: When you create a Disposed delegate, you identify the method that handles the event.
trans-unit.target: Quando si crea un delegato è stato eliminato, si identifica il metodo che gestisce l'evento.

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: Per associare l'evento al gestore eventi, aggiungere un'istanza del delegato all'evento.

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: Il gestore eventi viene chiamato ogni volta che si verifica l'evento, a meno che non venga rimosso il delegato.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the event handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sui delegati del gestore eventi, vedere [NIB: eventi e delegati](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of event handlers that are attached to this <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'elenco di gestori di eventi associati a questo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [NIB: utilizzo degli eventi](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"></xref> that provides the delegates for this component.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.EventHandlerList"> </xref> che fornisce i delegati per questo componente.

trans-unit.source: Releases unmanaged resources and performs other cleanup operations before the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is reclaimed by garbage collection.
trans-unit.target: Rilascia risorse non gestite ed esegue altre operazioni di pulizia prima che il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> venga recuperata tramite garbage collection.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo esegue l'override <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il codice dell'applicazione non deve chiamare questo metodo. un oggetto `Finalize` metodo viene richiamato automaticamente durante l'operazione di garbage collection, a meno che la finalizzazione del garbage collector non è stata disabilitata da una chiamata al <xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>metodo.</xref:System.GC.SuppressFinalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni, vedere [metodi Finalize e distruttori](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [la pulizia di risorse non gestite](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md), e [si esegue l'override del metodo Finalize](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

trans-unit.source: Returns an object that represents a service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> or by its <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Container"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un oggetto che rappresenta un servizio fornito dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> o dal relativo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Container"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method can be overridden by a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo può essere sottoposto a override da una classe derivata.

trans-unit.source: A service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Un servizio fornito dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> that represents a service provided by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> does not provide the specified service.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Object>che rappresenta un servizio fornito dal <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> non fornisce il servizio specificato.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> will have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>avrà un <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>se è stato aggiunto a un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>Assegna un <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>piace</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> is responsible for assigning the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>È responsabile dell'assegnazione <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: Changing the value of the component's <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> does not necessarily change the name of the site the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is assigned to.
trans-unit.target: Modifica del valore del componente <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>non necessariamente modifica il nome del sito di <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>viene assegnato a.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: The Site property should be set only by an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: La proprietà del sito deve essere impostata solo mediante un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>

trans-unit.source: The property value is `null` if the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is removed from its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore della proprietà `null` se <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>viene rimosso dal relativo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: Assigning `null` to this property does not necessarily remove the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: L'assegnazione di `null` a questa proprietà non implica necessariamente la rimozione <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>da <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> might or might not have a name.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>potrebbe oppure potrebbe non disporre di un nome.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name must be unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>viene assegnato un nome, il nome deve essere univoco tra gli altri <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>oggetti all'interno di relativo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the name of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>; therefore, you can only name a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> if it has an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>Archivia il nome del <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>pertanto, è possibile assegnare solo un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>se dispone di un oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>associato.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is not encapsulated in an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>, the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> does not have an <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"></xref> associated with it, or the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is removed from its <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> associato il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> non è incapsulato in un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>, il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> non dispone un <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ISite"> </xref> associati, o <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> viene rimosso dal relativo <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IContainer"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns a <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce un <xref:System.String>contenente il nome del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se presente.</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method should not be overridden.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non deve essere sostituito.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> may or may not have a name.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>può o non può avere un nome.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> is given a name, the name is unique among other <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> objects within its <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.
trans-unit.target: Se un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>viene assegnato un nome, il nome è univoco tra gli altri <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>oggetti all'interno di relativo <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> stores the name of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>Archivia il nome dell'elemento <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component> can only have an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> if it has been added to an <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> and the <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> assigns an <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> to it.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>può avere solo un <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>se è stato aggiunto a un <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>e <xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer>Assegna un <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite>piace</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IContainer> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISite> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> containing the name of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref>, if any, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"></xref> is unnamed.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.String>contenente il nome del <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref>, se presente, o <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> se il <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Component"> </xref> è senza nome.</xref:System.String>
